feed.title: Your awesome title
feed.subtitle: Write an awesome description for your new site here. You can edit this line in _config.yml. It will appear in your document head meta (for Google search results) and in your feed.xml site description.

entry.title: Mostly on Chinese site - Decalaration
entry.content:
Declaration

Original posts are all written in chinese, which I havenâ€™t got time to translate.

I have wrriten a handful of posts on web developement, but they are all in chinese and many of them are not revised for posting yet.

Since I am using automatic i18n techniques, you can switch to chinese site manually on my home-page.

You may also adjusting to darker themes using the button on navigation bar.
